Plot: Imagine the classic monster characters - Frankenstein's Monster, Count Dracula, The Mummy, The Bride of Frankenstein, and The Wolf Man - in their first day of school, being taught by a genuine horror hostess: Ivonna Cadaver.
Title: Monster School: A New Sitcom
Actors: Alan August, Talia Banuelos, Ryan Alexander Clague, Natalie Popovich
